00053 struct PrintFunc : public std::unary_function<T, void>
00054 {
00055   std::ostream& os;
00056   PrintFunc(std::ostream& out) : os(out) {}
00057   void operator() (T x) { os << x ; }

00060 template <typename T>
00061 T MAX(const T &lhs, const T &rhs)
00062 {
00063   return (lhs>rhs) ? lhs : rhs;
00064 };
00065 
00066 template <typename T>
00067 T MIN(const T &lhs, const T &rhs)
00068 {
00069   return (lhs<rhs) ? lhs : rhs;
00070 };

00073 // TODO / MIGHT REGRET / TEMP: Since ideally we don't want to be using macros, I'm going to rename the MIN and MAX
00074 // macros to something painfully obvious (and painful to use).  Later, we'll want to find all the places

00076 
00077 #define MIN_MACRO(x,y) ((x)<(y) ? (x) : (y))
00078 #define MAX_MACRO(x,y) ((x)>(y) ? (x) : (y))

00088 inline std::ostream &tab(std::ostream& os)
00089 {
00090         os << "\t";
00091         return os;
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00099 struct TabStream
00100 {
00101         unsigned int num_tabs;
00102 
00103         TabStream(int _num_tabs) : num_tabs(_num_tabs) {}
00104 
00105         friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream& os, const TabStream& tab_stream)
00106         {
00107                 for(unsigned int i = 0; i < tab_stream.num_tabs; ++i)
00108                         os << "\t";
00109                 return os;
00110         }
00111 };
00112 
00113 
00118 inline TabStream tab(const unsigned int num_tabs)
00119 {
00120         return TabStream(num_tabs);
00121 }
